description:
This incredible 2 year new home is packed with stunning features in a premium location and leaves nothing for the lucky new owners to do but enjoy. It was thoughtfully designed to bring a unique and personalised living experience to its owners, ensuring prestige features throughout and a harmonious indoor/outdoor lifestyle.

From the first street glance, this incredibly presented property gives you a prestige, yet homely feel provided by the sleek, contemporary design and the quiet street with a never to be built out nature reserve directly across from the home. This property was originally purchased as a premiere block as it will have a view to the upcoming North Harbour Marina.

As you approach, the stunning wide entrance coupled with a designer timber & glass panelled front door, sets the scene for the tour through this flawlessly appointed residence. Once inside & heading down the hall, you're instantly met with a spacious feel by the separate media room and spacious open plan living/dining area in view. Your eyes will surely be drawn to the stunning timber-look flooring.

The kitchen is the hub of every home and this spectacular one will surely impress the chef in the family. Exhibiting high end finishes, an abundance of clever cabinetry storage space, gorgeous stone bench tops, large fridge space (plumbed in), Blanco 90cm Canopy Rangehood, Westinghouse 5 x burner gas stove top & oven, hidden Smeg dishwasher, pull out kitchen mixer tap, stainless steel double sink, marble look tile splashbacks, spacious breakfast bar and a stunning design, not to mention the spacious Walk-In Butler's pantry with a bench space & abundance of shelf space. This space really couldn't get any better.

Adjacent to the kitchen is a magnificent living space and dining area, which effortlessly flows onto the outdoor entertaining patio with cornerless shutter doors. This entertaining hub of the home is surrounded by doors and windows, providing constant natural light and a relaxing ambience. The outdoor patio has stunning wood-look tile flooring and a ceiling fan, overlooking the low maintenance yard, perfect for those with busy lifestyles.

When it is time to retreat, the master bedroom will impress with a sliding door entry, gorgeous plantation shutters which are fitted throughout the home, ducted air-conditioning, ceiling fan, the generous walk in robe with sensor lighting and 2 sections allowing a wardrobe per person, and an en-suite with a stunning timber look vanity, stone benchtop, separate toilet room and a large shower featuring a built in shelf with a designer tile splashback and a rainfall showerhead. The 3 additional generously sized bedrooms are all equipped with built-in robes, ducted airconditioning, plantation shutters & ceiling fans.

Continuing to impress and providing an opportunity for the family to spread out or come together for movie nights, is the media room! This space includes sliding doors, a cinema effect with dark walls for an optimal viewing experience, projector & screen and LED colour strip lights surrounding the ceiling.

As well as the large open plan living and dining area, huge kitchen with the butlers pantry and a separate media room, this well designed home continues to impress with a separate laundry room and an opulent bathroom.

The laundry includes an abundance of timber-look cabnietry including a linen cupboard, stone bench top space, a large washing tub and a door straight outside to the clothesline. The main bathroom is fitted with stunning large floor tiles, plantation shutters, a bath tub, a gorgeous timber-look vanity and the shower with the designer tile built in shelf matching the ensuite and a rainfall showerhead.

Become part of the vibrant new North Harbour community. Nestled right in the heart of the growth corridor between Brisbane and the Sunshine Coast. Located at Burpengary East, North Harbour residents will also enjoy direct access to Brisbane's CBD and the Sunshine Coast; only around a 45-minute and 41-minute drive, with quick and easy to access to the Bruce Highway from your home. North Harbour has been named Best Residential Subdivision in Queensland. The estate includes many parks, nature outlooks, fitness areas, a community vegetable garden and endless walking paths, the closest starting only 5 meters from your home!

This immaculate brand new home combines all the desired conveniences and striking features of modern architecture and a resort style living that creates the perfect setting & balance for day-to-day family life.

Property Features:
- Stunning 2 year-year Superior Home
- Prime real estate - 364m2
- Great location - North Harbour Estate
- 'Premiere block' with no front neighbour, overlook to the never to be built out nature reserve and view of the upcoming North Harbour Marina
- Ceiling fans through-out
- Plantation shutters through-out.
- Ducted Air-conditioning
- 3 Spacious bedrooms all including plantation shutters, ducted A/C, ceiling fans & wardrobes
- Master bedroom also features a walk in wardrobe with two sections & sensor lighting, an opulent ensuite with a separate toilet room, vanity, stone benchtop and large shower with built in shelf & rainfall showerhead
- Main bathroom with matching features to the ensuite plus a bath tub
- Media room with sliding doors, cinema-like dark room, projector & screen and colourful LED strip lighting surrounding ceiling (Previously bedroom 4, set up as a media room)
- Kitchen with high end finishes, an abundance of clever cabinetry storage space, gorgeous stone bench tops, large fridge space (plumbed in), Blanco 90cm Canopy Rangehood, Westinghouse 5 x burner gas stove top & oven, hidden Smeg dishwasher, pull out kitchen mixer tap, stainless steel double sink, marble look tile splashbacks, spacious breakfast bar and a stunning design, not to mention the spacious Walk-In Butler's pantry with a bench space & abundance of shelf space
- Separate laundry with linen cupboard, stone benchtop, large tub & sliding door straight to the clothesline
- Outdoor entertaining patio with timber-look floor tiles
- Low maintenance yard
- 6.6KW solar system (40 panels)

Note: 4th bedroom is currently converted into the media room.

This breathtaking home is a dream that ticks all the boxes. To view and start your future memories, call Kathy or Will today on: 0427 374 117
